title: Unknown sender triggers approval notification
description: Verify that a message from an unknown sender triggers a notification to the primary human

steps.action: Simulate a Telegram message from an unknown sender (not in safe-senders or 3rd-party-senders)
steps.expected: Message is not injected into the session

steps.action: Check that a notification was sent to the primary's Telegram chat ID
steps.expected: Primary receives a message with sender name, ID, and message content

steps.action: Check that the unknown sender received a 'checking with my human' response
Check that the message is queued in pending state
steps.expected: Message is stored for later processing

result: All 4 steps verified via code inspection. Unknown sender triggers notification to primary, holding message to sender, and message queued in pending state.
